meanings.definition: Without a saddle on a horse
meanings.sent1: The cowboy rode the bareback horse skillfully.
meanings.sent2: She preferred riding bareback because it felt more natural.
meanings.sent3: The bareback horse seemed to enjoy the freedom of no saddle.
meanings.sent4: The bareback ride through the meadow was a thrilling experience.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bareback horse galloping across the field was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Without a condom during sexual intercourse
meanings.sent1: They decided to go bareback and take a risk.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe it is risky to engage in intercourse bareback.
meanings.sent3: The couple joked about going bareback but then decided against it.
meanings.sent4: She described their relationship as going bareback without protection.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going bareback made him nervous about potential consequences.
